title: Unknown Error on login
body: WHen I try to log in(new client) I get an unknown error, if i try to login again it just freezes at authenticating, and if I try to go to the old client it freezes and doesnt work

replies.body:
It sounds like your client is unable to properly communicate with the authentication servers. I'd like you to work through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure you aren't running a bad network configuration that would cause this.

Let me know if this helped.
